title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo – self-hosted LLM runner with a REST/CLI interface and model library (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.).

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models with a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models for chat, tools, retrieval, agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (themes, multi-user, code highlighting).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, streaming, embeddings.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST API; chat, generate, pull, delete models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI (Rust) for interactive Ollama chats with history & syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models inline as GitHub-Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) plus compose examples.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration for Ollama generators & embedders.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with chat, generate, models, embeddings; supports streaming.

title: ollama-laravel
summary: Laravel wrapper providing Facade & Artisan commands to chat with Ollama.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app exposing Ollama as async chat & embedding endpoints.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama; small, idiomatic, streaming.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate wrapping Ollama REST endpoints with Tokio streaming.

title: ollama-n8n
summary: n8n community node to call Ollama models inside no-code workflows.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot bringing local Ollama models to servers with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with Ollama models in channels/DMs.
